title: Help me :<
body:
My internet has been fixed before e few hours, but im getting been dc from games, is it client bug ? My screen freeze. I can walk normaly but i cant use spells etc. 
_**> * Please help me**_{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: It sounds like your connection might be degrading, starting with packet loss then an all out d/c.  I suggest hopping into custom games for now and using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Give it a go and let me know how it works out for you!
